private.title: 100% Private & Secure
private.description: All timing is done locally in your browser. No tracking, no data collection, ensuring complete privacy.

precision.title: Precision Timing
precision.description: Accurate to milliseconds for stopwatch. Perfect for sports, workouts, cooking, and any time-sensitive activities.

lapRecording.title: Lap Time Recording
lapRecording.description: Record and compare multiple lap times with detailed statistics including fastest and slowest laps.

flexible.title: Flexible Timer
flexible.description: Set custom countdown timers with quick presets or manual input. Audio alerts when time is up.

responsive.title: Works Everywhere
responsive.description: Fully responsive design works on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Use it anywhere, anytime.

free.title: 100% Free Forever
free.description: No limits on usage. Create unlimited stopwatches and timers completely free with all features.
